short_summary: Conduct surveys and reassessments of the hazardous building materials at several campuses
description: The National Research Council Canada - Real Property Planning and Management (NRC-RPPM), has a requirement for the services of a contractor to conduct surveys and reassessments of the hazardous building materials at the Montreal Road, Sussex and Uplands campuses (approximately 60 buildings). The scope of the reassessments shall include building materials and components incorporated in the structure and its finishes (excluding exterior finishes).

### Advance Contract Award Notice: HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCES ANALYSIS SERVICES
**Tender Contract Details**

* **Contract Title (English)**: Hazardous Substances Analysis Services at NRC Campuses
* **Contract Title (French)**: Analyse des substances dangereuses aux campus du CNRC
* **Reference Number**: 22-01009443
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58062
* **Publication Date**: October 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 24, 2022, 2:00 PM ET
* **Contract Period**: Due to the tender closing date being already passed, this opportunity has expired.

**Contract Overview**
The National Research Council Canada's (NRC) Real Property Planning and Management (RPPM) Group has a requirement for hazardous substances analysis services. The contractor will provide surveying and reassessment services for building materials at NRC campuses in Ottawa. The reassessment will focus on the hazardous building materials incorporated in the structure and its finishes.

**Key Requirements**
- Conduct surveys and reassessments of hazardous building materials in approximately 60 buildings across NRC campuses in Ottawa
- Scientifically analyze incorporated hazardous materials in the structure and finishes

**Eligibility**
- Offerors must be also registered to do business with the Government of Canada
- Contact Roxanne Azzi Abboud of the National Research Council of Canada at roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or +1-613-299-9650 for further information

**Attachments**
Refer to the official Government of Canada tender notice at [ here ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/a7ca031f72d94b9ecdef808eff03cdfe/22-58062_acan_pac_pinchin_en.pdf) (English) or [here ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/f980564a8dccd4d43a81a3ca333bd978/22-58062_pac_acan_pinchin_fr.pdf) (French) for further details. 

**Trade Agreements**
This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
